title: GO GO, LETS GO, LETS GO, FACELESS!

embed.description: They can't beat what they can't predict. Welcome to the Mid-Season Trials event in League of Legends, which runs from May 8 - June 2, 2019. During the event, you will be sorted into one of four competitive houses (The Faceless, The Faceless, The United, or The Faceless) to compete for individual and house-wide rewards.

body:
I've seen some posts wandering on the boards about players not wanting to watch missions. good news for us, let those other stupid houses lose the event.

#THIS IS A MESSAGE TO THE FACELESS HOUSE MEMBERS, YOU MUST COMPLETE YOUR WATCH MISSIONS, WE CANNOT LET THE OTHER HOUSES WIN, WE HAVE THE POWER OF GOD, ANIME, AND FAKER ON OUR SIDE!!!!!!

FACELESS FOR THE WIN.


zac support one trick, I also play fiddle top/mid, faceless description and quiz 100% fit me, that's why I chose it, lets win the event and pave our own path
